message.body: Sue just called me and was not able to get into until averse to put in your hours did you have any luck?
No. Just asking Pat for help. Let you know in a couple of minutes
No. I can't even get past the logon.
Same with SUE she's going to call the 800 number I'll get back to you
I just spoke to Michelle and as soon as she gets home she's going to try to get in I'll let you know what happens
Okay. It might be too late for me. Very tired
did you read page 11 of the surge manual? Michelle mentioned page has information if you're having trouble logging in.
I'm sorry will get it straightened out by tomorrow you will be paid
I am okay with it all. Worry about it tomorrow.
Sue did get in finally after following instructions on page 11 of surge manual which you did not receive in your email
I will forward it to you
